long_description: elwin grew up in and around the family's tailor shop. elwin's commitment and hard work is reflected in the fact that memorial tailors has again been voted houston's best tailors. whether you have a unique idea for a custom dress or a suit, or even curtains and cushions, elwin is your man. come experience the best tailor in houston. mario's creativity has also been used to design custom dance uniforms for all the houston professional teams: houston texans, houston rockets & houston dynamo. our founders, mario duarte and elwin tejada, were surrounded by tailoring their whole lives. growing up in and around tailors shops, our story began as kids, where we developed the passion for the art of tailoring. memorial tailors is a professional tailor shop, servicing houston and surrounding areas since 1993. memorial tailors in houston offers the highest level of service to all our customers. we are conveniently located by memorial city and soon will have a bridal specialty location in the montrose area.
